attributes.action: Change mothercares name. To peoplecare or personcare. As its sexist towards men.
attributes.background:
In light of Mansize kleenex having to rebrand and gentlemans sandwhich at M&S gentlemans whiskey and smyths toys having to be more gender specific. 
Its time to level the playing field! I want mothercare to change their name! To be more gender specific

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Mothercare is a private company and the UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for their decisions.

You may wish to contact them directly about this issue.
